metadata.title: Bricks & Mortar
metadata.description: Property expense tracking application for homeowners, landlords, and renters

about.title: About Bricks & Mortar
about.description: Learn more about our mission and story

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to simplify property expense management for homeowners, landlords, and renters with innovative and user-friendly tools.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2023, Bricks & Mortar was created by a team of property owners and technology experts who experienced firsthand the challenges of tracking property expenses and managing shared costs.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.content: We believe in clear, honest communication with our users and within our team.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.content: We continuously improve our platform with new features and enhancements.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.content: We build reliable software that our users can depend on for their property management needs.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: Our diverse team of professionals is passionate about creating solutions that make property management easier and more efficient.

auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.emailAlreadyRegistered: This email is already registered. Please log in or use a different email.
auth.invalidPassword: The password you entered is invalid. Please try again.
auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
auth.emailConfirmationSent: We've sent a confirmation link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to confirm your account.
auth.resetEmailSent: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to reset your password.
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.passwordUpdatedDescription: Your password has been successfully updated. You can now log in with your new password.
auth.pleaseWait: Please wait while we verify your email
auth.loginToYourAccount: Your email has been confirmed, please log in to your account
auth.accountActivated: Your account has been successfully activated!
auth.errorConfirmingEmail: There was an error confirming your email
auth.verificationExpired: The verification link has expired. Please request a new one.
auth.verificationExpiredDescription: For security reasons, email verification links expire after a short time. Please try signing up again to receive a new verification link.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: This is your main dashboard where you'll be able to manage your properties and track expenses.

hero.title: Welcome to Bricks & Mortar
hero.description: The ultimate solution for managing your real estate investments. Track expenses, manage tenancies, and optimize your returns.

expenseTracking.title: Expense Tracking
expenseTracking.description: Track all expenses related to your properties in one place.

propertyManagement.title: Property Management
propertyManagement.description: Easily manage your properties, tenants, and contracts.

sharedCosts.title: Shared Costs
sharedCosts.description: Fairly split costs between co-owners and track payments.

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

profile.title: User Profile
profile.deleteAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
profile.deleteAccountWarning: If you delete your account, all your data and information will be deleted. This action is irreversible.
profile.name: Full Name
profile.clickToUpload: Click to upload a profile picture

errors.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload a JPG, PNG, or GIF image.
errors.uploadFailed: Failed to upload image. Please try again.
errors.saveFailed: Failed to save profile. Please try again.
errors.deleteFailedDescription: There was an error deleting your account. Please try again.

goodbye.title: Thank You for Using Bricks & Mortar
goodbye.message: We're sorry to see you go. Thank you for trying out our platform. If you change your mind, you can always create a new account.

storedProperties.title: Saved Properties Found
storedProperties.description: We found the following properties saved in your browser. Would you like to add any of these to your account?

new.title: Add New Property
new.description: Fill in the details below to add a new property to your portfolio.

sections.basicInfoDesc: Enter the basic details about your property including name and location.
sections.propertyDetailsDesc: Specify the physical characteristics of your property.
sections.financialInfoDesc: Enter the financial details of your property investment.
sections.imagesDesc: Upload photos of your property to showcase its features and condition.

placeholders.name: e.g., My Downtown Condo
placeholders.address: Full address including city and postal code
placeholders.description: Add any additional details about your property...

validation.bedroomsRequired: Please enter the number of bedrooms
validation.bathroomsRequired: Please enter the number of bathrooms

errors.createFailed: There was an error creating your property. Please try again.
errors.updateFailed: There was an error updating your property. Please try again.
errors.finalizeFailed: There was an error finalizing your property. Please try again.
errors.submitFailed: Failed to submit the form. Please try again.

images.dropzone: Drop files here or click to upload
